this house costs about 1800. It's square fortage is about 45.0. The orientation of the house is NS. It is located at floor 12. It has elevator. Despite being smaller, this house is south-facing and offers good green views of the community. It is also well-maintained.

this house costs about 1802. It's square fortage is about 45.05. The orientation of the house is NS. It is located at floor 15. It has elevator. prompt_inputs.memory:
You are trying to decide between two different communities. Community_1 has inconvenient facilities, while Community_2 is close to your wife's workplace and your child's school. Ultimately, you decide to go with Community_2 due to its proximity and convenience. Although it may require more effort to settle into the area, you think it is worth it in the end.
Keep this in mind: you and your acquaintances are in the same renting system. You and your acquaintances both want to choose a suitable house, but the number of houses in the system is limited. You are in a competitive relationship with each other.
